name: Tree1
water: Allow the soil to dry out completely before watering.
tips: Gently insert a toothpick into the soil to determine if your plant needs watering.

name: Tree2
water: Water regularly but do not overwater.
tips: Ensure good drainage to prevent root rot.

name: Tree3
water: Keep the soil moist but not soggy.
tips: Prune regularly to maintain shape.

name: Tree4
water: Water deeply once a week.
tips: Mulch around the base to retain moisture.

name: Plant1
water: Water when the top inch of soil is dry.
tips: Rotate the plant occasionally for even growth.

name: Plant2
water: Keep the soil consistently moist.
tips: Mist the leaves regularly to increase humidity.

name: Plant3
water: Water sparingly, allowing the soil to dry out between waterings.
tips: Avoid overwatering to prevent root rot.

name: Plant4
water: Water thoroughly when the soil feels dry.
tips: Fertilize monthly during the growing season.

name: Flower1
water: Water regularly to keep the soil moist.
tips: Deadhead spent flowers to encourage new blooms.

name: Flower2
water: Keep the soil evenly moist.
tips: Provide good air circulation to prevent mildew.

name: Flower3
water: Water when the top inch of soil is dry.
tips: Use a balanced fertilizer every two weeks.

name: Flower4
water: Water deeply once a week.
tips: Mulch to retain moisture and suppress weeds.

name: Bush1
water: Water regularly, keeping the soil moist.
tips: Prune after flowering to maintain shape.

name: Bush2
water: Water deeply and infrequently.
tips: Apply mulch to conserve moisture.

name: Bush3
water: Keep the soil consistently moist.
tips: Fertilize in early spring for best growth.

name: Bush4
water: Water when the top inch of soil is dry.
tips: Prune to remove dead or damaged branches.

name: Shrub1
water: Water regularly, allowing the soil to dry out between waterings.
tips: Provide support for young plants.

name: Shrub2
water: Keep the soil evenly moist.
tips: Mulch to retain moisture and control weeds.

name: Shrub3
water: Water deeply once a week.
tips: Prune to maintain shape and encourage growth.

name: Shrub4
water: Water when the top inch of soil is dry.
tips: Fertilize monthly during the growing season.
